### Chart A

```{r}

devtools::install_github("p8105/p8105.datasets") 
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")



instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n>10000) %>% 
  mutate(
    aisle=factor(aisle),
    aisle= fct_reorder(aisle,n)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(x= ~aisle, y=~n,
          alpha=.5,type="bar", mode="markers")
  
```
